attributes.action: ban all immigration from countries poorer than Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Surely it is immoral to let skilled people from poorer countries work in Britain when they are needed by their own countries, and if they are not skilled then the unemployed here should be made to take the jobs.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
